Text: Generate a short paragraph about 'nutrition' targeting readability level Middle School. Limit the output to 150 words. Nutrition is like fuel for our body. It helps us grow, stay healthy, and have energy to play and learn. We need different types of foods to get all the nutrients we need. These include proteins, vitamins, and minerals. Eating a balanced diet with fruits, vegetables, lean proteins, and whole grains ensures we get all the nutrition we need. Staying hydrated with water is also crucial. Remember, what we eat impacts our health and well-being. So, let's make smart choices and enjoy a variety of nutritious foods!

Text: Generate a short paragraph about 'nutrition' targeting readability level Middle School. Limit the output to 150 words. "Nutrition is like fuel for our bodies.
